# Assignment

In this assignment you will go back to our three previous assignments and 
recreate a three figures to present as beautifully as possible. Imagine this report
is going to be shared with a group interested in what we are doing in this course.

Each plot should:
* Make it clear where the data was collected
* Clearly highlight the effect of interest
* Have proper labels and units
